titleStmt.title: A song set by Richard Elford ; sung by Mrs. Hodgson at the new theatre ; engraved by Tho. Cross.
titleStmt.author: Elford, Richard, d. 1714.

notesStmt.note: First line of text reads: Ah! cruel Damon cease to teaze.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
